about_the_game:
Quantum Gravity Soundtracks
This pack contains a small collection of all soundtracks featured in the Game QuantumGravity...
Quantum Gravity is space themed bullet hell platformer. The game's main mechanic is inverting gravity to hover through space. Including long-range fights but also melees fighting.

The soundtracks revolve around the theme of the game, in the future more songs will be added. They are only musical, with no singing. The soundtracks assimilate themselves and revolve around the idea of the thundering rage of the game.

Quantum Gravity is space themed bullet hell platformer. The game's main mechanic is invng gravity to hover through space. It features long-range fights but also melees fighting. Quantum Gravity has a variety of enemies to fight against and also 3 game modes including an infinity game mode, The game can be played on any controller supported while still preserving its quality, and having the same in-game experience as with a keyboard and mouse.

Infinity Mode
The infinity game mode offers an infinite number of levels that increase in their difficulty resulting in hardcore game mechanics. The main goal is to survive and win against the enemies. Including boss fights, and close or ranged combat.

Multiplayer
Multiplayer mode lets you connect with your friends and play 1v1 rounds, with a winner and a loser. The rules are the same, environment gravity is disabled by default but can be switched on by the host, making everything fly around.

Gravity Mode
The gravity game mode has its special mechanic. While in the other game modes you can only invert the player's mechanic, in the gravity game mode you can also invert the gravity of the objects around you. Making the gameplay a special experience due to its complexity.

But the campaign mode never ends every few bigger updates and events the campaign mode will change and suit itself to the occurring event. Making the experience of thiinfinitelynfinity.
